content:
Hi all,
The talks will be live streamed on YouTube in addition to be live on Zoom. If you want to watch them on YouTube, this is the playlist:
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLaILTSnVfqtK7iHSyx8ssnt6LNbAvTo1p

Keep in mind that there is one live for each session. (The schedule can be found here, https://categorytheory.zulipchat.com/#narrow/stream/238032-Categorical-Probability.20and.20Statistics.202020.20workshop/topic/Schedule)
The streaming makes it possible to watch the talk with some delay, for example if you miss the start.

For any troubleshooting, please see the tech support thread here: https://categorytheory.zulipchat.com/#narrow/stream/238032-Categorical-Probability.20and.20Statistics.202020.20workshop/topic/Tech.20support

The live streams for the first day have now being replaced by the recorded videos, which have a higher resolution.
You can find the videos in the main playlist: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLaILTSnVfqtIebAXFOcee9MvAyBwhIMyr
Also the live streams for the second day have been replaced by the recorded videos. Same link as above.
Same for fourth day! All videos are up :)

Hi all,

I'm getting "this video is private" when I try to watch most of the talks on YouTube - I just want to check if this means they're not available any more. (The workshop was mostly at night for me, so I'm hoping to catch up slowly to the extent that I can.)

I realise some speakers might not want the talks available after the workshop, but just want to check in case there's a technical issue.

Sorry, the issue was mine I think. For most of the talks there's a link to the live stream near the top of the discussion, and those are not available any more, but later in the thread there's a different link, to a video that does work - I hadn't realised those were different links.
